means: （基督教某些教派管辖大教区的）主教( bishop的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: He ordained his own priests, and threatened to ordain bishops.
sentence.Network_cn: 他自行任命了牧师，还扬言要任命主教。

sentence.Network_en: Each player has two bishops at the start of the game.
sentence.Network_cn: 棋赛开始时,每名棋手有两只象.

sentence.Network_en: He defied Pope John Paul II by consecrating four bishops without his approval.
sentence.Network_cn: 他违抗教皇约翰·保罗二世的旨意，未经他的批准就给4位主教举行了祝圣仪式。

PerfectNetExp.abs: a liturgical headdress worn by bishops on formal occasions ., 主教教徒在正式场合戴的一种礼拜式的头饰.

the bishops' first comprehensive statement on capital punishment in 25 years said that , " the sanction of death violates respect for human life and dignity . "美国主教团在这份25年来首度全面论述死刑问题的声明里说，“死刑违犯了对人类生命的尊重。”
the theological doctrine of Church government by bishops ., 教会政府主教们的神学教义.
the Vatican gave no reason for the Pope's refusal and said the bishops would be given different duties .梵蒂冈没有对教皇的拒绝给出任何理由，他们表示，这两名神父应该被赋予新的职责。

list.abs: 助理主教（英文 coadjutor bishop），指有继承权而辅佐教区主教的主教。 　　资料来源：台湾光启出版社出版·辅仁神大学神学院·神学著 …
服装英语2 ... 蝙蝠袖 batwing sleeve 泡泡袖 bishop sleeve 花瓣袖 petal sleeve.
因为其位阶次于牧首/宗主教，与都主教(Metropolitan bishop)、大主教(Archbishop)相当，因此有不少英中字典译为都主教、大主教。 …
枢机主教（Cardinal Bishop）、宗主教（Patriarch）、首席主教（Primate）、总主教（Archbishop）、都主教（Metropolitan）、教 …
priest,vicar,bishop,archbishop有什么区别... ... cardinal 枢机/红衣主教 cardinal bishop 主教枢机 cardinal priest 司铎枢机.

entry.def: A bishop is a clergyman of high rank in the Roman Catholic, Anglican, and Orthodox churches.
In chess a bishop is a piece that can be moved diagonally across the board on squares that are the same colour.
